Then let's say Mars is inhabited and send some guys up there.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Well you see you dont construct Cybertron to the way people want. If 
you give 
> them what they want then they know what to expect. It isn't fun that 
way. If 
> you use what we know from G1 and BW and make changes and stuff then 
thats 
> okay becuase you still leave room for unpredicted stuff. But I agree 
with KSL 
> in saying the RPGs demise is coming close if the Monotomoy isnt 
broken soon. 
> You can only fight in the same place with the same people for so 
long before 
> its not fun anymore.
